page.title: 12Employment Flintham/Syerston
page.content:
Predominantly professional people, commuting to the Nottingham area, with farm workers who have lived in the village most of their lives.
Unemployment is not a problem and all being well the Officers' Mess, Inholms Gardens will become an old people's home and may provide some jobs for the teenagers soon to be leaving school and not intending to go on to further education.
The influx of professional people into both villages has changed the life style to some extent - it is often very quiet during the day. It also means that houses change hands more frequently. However some of the newcomers have decided they like their village enough to put down roots and become long term residents.
